item.title: By: Rob McDonagh
item.dc:creator: Rob McDonagh
item.description: <p>Yeah, or as a reader, you can simply block the domain (mutantsrus.com) in an AdBlock extension, and voila! all of a sudden the script kiddie doesn't affect any of the sites you read. :D<br /><br />But yes, I applied the patched template the other day. Haven't seen any attempts, but better safe than irritated...</p>
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, or as a reader, you can simply block the domain (mutantsrus.com) in an AdBlock extension, and voila! all of a sudden the script kiddie doesn’t affect any of the sites you read. ðŸ˜€

But yes, I applied the patched template the other day. Haven’t seen any attempts, but better safe than irritated…
